Summary: bright orange light like a airplane comming in then direction change till it disappeared then the 2nd following same path and disappearing also
divs: Sighting Detailslooked like a plane comming in only all orange in color thats what drew my attention. looking into the north sky it was flying towards me in the south then changed direction going to the east when it started to loose size until it was a pin prick then dissappear as another appeared from the same north to south and followed the same path and dimminish in size until gone as the 1st had done. wanted to stay out and watch but my grandson got pretty freaked out and wanted to go indoors. called my husband and grandson out when 1st light changed direction and while i was pointing to where 1st one was getting smaller in size my 9 yr. old grandson pointed to the second one and said like that one which is when i noticed the 2nd one that just seem to appear out of nowhere.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Williamsport
There were no other sightings in Williamsport on or around June 16th 2012
